skip_ex



bool skipOverBack(alias pred = "a == b", R1, R2)(ref R1 r1, R2 r2) if (is(typeof(binaryFun!pred(r1.back, r2.back))));
If , consume the corresponding elements off and return . Otherwise, leave unchanged and return .

size_t skipOverEither(alias pred = "a == b", Range, Ranges...)(ref Range haystack, Ranges needles) if (Ranges.length >= 2 && is(typeof(startsWith!pred(haystack, needles))));
Variadic Version of .

Returns:
index + 1 into matching , 0 otherwise.
